experience.title: Startup Mentor (early stage)
experience.description: I help 0-to-1 founders build MVPs, secure funding, and scale their startups with expertise in program operations, fundraising strategy, and product development. With experience designing accelerator programs, securing $500K+ in credits, and working with YC-backed and Accel-funded startups, I guide founders to build processes, refine pitches, and access my network for growth.

experience.title: Program Manager
experience.description: - Designed and executed a comprehensive three-phased accelerator program for robotics startups across India and Southeast Asia.- Facilitated a $500,000 credit deal in SaaS and CAD tools to empower startups with essential resources for growth.- Built strategic partnerships with incubators and accelerators across India to strengthen deal flow pipelines.- Developed an automated tool to track and manage program progress efficiently, ensuring seamless operations from selection to fundraising.

experience.title: Investor Relations
experience.description: I joined Stack(YC 21) as the Investor Relations Manager. I am currently serving as the Associate Product Manager and building an exceptional experience enabling the masses to invest like the top 1%. I play a pivotal role in driving growth and fostering exceptional customer experiences.

experience.title: Founding team
experience.description: Being on the team of the first 10 people who started building Dezerv, I had the privilege of working closely with a brilliant team of MIT graduates, Wall Street bankers, and accomplished wealth management directors. Wearing multiple hats in the 0 to 1 journey, I contributed to the development of a cutting-edge wealth tech platform that empowered clients to achieve financial success.
